A mock data set consisting of $5$ three dimensional data points:

```{r}
library(plotly)
d <- data.frame(x = c(-1, 0, 1, 0, 2), 
                y = c(0, 3, 0, 1, 1), 
                z = c(1, 1, 0, 0, 2), 
                lab = letters[1:5]) 

p <- plot_ly(d, x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z, color = ~lab) %>%
  add_markers() 

p

```
